title: Ep 174: Perfume Genius with Margaret Cho
itunes:title: Ep 174: Perfume Genius with Margaret Cho
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discover that they might actually believe in the effects of Mercury in retrograde. Then, Margaret Cho tells them all about her perfume collection including the scent based on the smell of semen, why her ideal trench coat color is bird po...
description:
Kate and Doree discover that they might actually believe in the effects of Mercury in retrograde. Then, Margaret Cho tells them all about her perfume collection including the scent based on the smell of semen, why her ideal trench coat color is bird poop green, and how she bucked the system and came to love living alone. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 

Tickets for Doree's book launch are available here!
